passages.title: Grand Opening â€” Riverside Business Center
passages.content:
Riverside Business Center is proud to announce the grand opening of its expanded facilities on April 1st. We now offer 45 fully furnished office suites ranging from 200 to 800 square feet, along with shared amenities including a rooftop lounge, conference rooms, and 24-hour reception.

For April, all new tenants receive a 20% discount on their first three months of rent. Free high-speed internet and utilities are included in all lease agreements.

Contact our leasing office at 555-0192. Limited spaces available.
